CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Paid"), IMAGE("/img/icon/entitlements24.png", "Gold Medal"), IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Submitted"), IMAGE("/img/samples/flag_red.gif", "Red to-do flag"),
IF(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Draft"), IMAGE("/img/func_icons/util/pencil12.gif", "Draft pencil"),
"No status")))
CustomField.label: Status rating
